title: What Do You Really Know About Islam - Khalid Yasin
description:
Publisher/Manufacturer: Khalid Yasin 
Product specifications: DVD 
Item type: DVD 

Product description: 

Sheikh Khalid Yasin is what is known as a da'ee; this basically means a person who speaks publicly about the Islamic faith in order to invigorate the spiritual and moral conscience of listeners, or to educate and inform people about the Islamic faith.

Shaykh Khalid Yasin has spent the majority of his life travelling through out the world delivering lectures on the various issues and aspects of Islam.
